ch.bfh.ti.sed.patmon1.server.controller

Interface SessionControllerProxy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SessionControllerProxyImpl

    public interface SessionControllerProxy
    The session controller proxy is used to send authenticated requests (commands) to the server. The proxy's responsibility is to make sure that only request which contain a valid session are handed over to the real SessionController.

    It defines a WebService with JAX-WS over which the client can communicate.

    • Method Detail

      • openSession

        Session openSession(DoctorSBO doctor)
        Creates a SessionController which is stored in the SessionStorage and returns the therefore opened session.
        Parameters:
        doctor - the doctor to open a Sessio nfor
        Returns:
        the created session.

      • isActivated

        boolean isActivated(Session session)
                    throws InvalidSessionException
        Checks activation of the session's doctor.
        Parameters:
        session - the session token
        Returns:
        true, if the doctor is activated, false otherwise
        Throws:
        InvalidSessionException - if the session is invalid

      • enterActivationCode

        void enterActivationCode(String activationCode,
                       Session session)
                         throws InvalidSessionException
        Enters the activation code to activate the doctor.
        Parameters:
        activationCode - the activation code to enter
        session - the session token
        Throws:
        InvalidSessionException - if the session is invalid

      • logout

        void logout(Session session)
            throws InvalidSessionException
        Logs out the doctor and disposes of the session.
        Parameters:
        session - the session token
        Throws:
        InvalidSessionException - if the session is invalid

      • registerPatient

        void registerPatient(Patient patient,
                   Session session)
                     throws InvalidSessionException,
                            EntityAlreadyExistsException
        Registers a new patient using the patient data transfer object.
        Parameters:
        patient - the patient data to use for creating the patient
        session - the session token
        Throws:
        InvalidSessionException - if the session is invalid
        EntityAlreadyExistsException - if there is already a Patient in the database with the ssn of the patient in question.

      • getPatients

        PatientList getPatients(Session session)
                        throws InvalidSessionException
        Returns all patients in the database for the authenticated doctor.
        Parameters:
        session - the session token
        Returns:
        a PatientList containing the patients, which is empty, if there are no patients for the doctor.
        Throws:
        InvalidSessionException - if the session is invalid

      • defineObservationPeriod

        void defineObservationPeriod(String patientSsn,
                           Integer deviceId,
                           Date periodStart,
                           Date periodEnd,
                           int measurementIntervalInSeconds,
                           Session session)
                             throws InvalidSessionException,
                                    EntityNotFoundException,
                                    DeviceAlreadyAssignedException,
                                    IllegalStateException
        Defines a new observation period and sets the device into test-mode
        Parameters:
        patientSsn - the patient's ssn to create the observation period for
        deviceId - the device's id to initialize with the period data
        periodStart - the start of the period
        periodEnd - the end of the period
        measurementIntervalInSeconds - the interval in seconds by which measurements should be taken
        session - the session token
        Throws:
        InvalidSessionException - if the session is invalid
        EntityNotFoundException - if either the patient or the device is not found in the database
        DeviceAlreadyAssignedException - if the device is already assigned to a observation period
        IllegalStateException - if there is a device for the session which is still in test-mode.

      • testMeasure

        Measurement testMeasure(Session session)
                        throws InvalidSessionException,
                               IllegalStateException
        Performs a test measure. This method can only be called if a device is in test-mode. The test-measurement is not stored in the database.
        Parameters:
        session - the session token
        Returns:
        the result of the test-measurement.
        Throws:
        InvalidSessionException - if the session is invalid
        IllegalStateException - if there is no device in test-mode

      • endTest

        void endTest(Session session)
             throws InvalidSessionException,
                    IllegalStateException
        Ends the current test-mode on the device. There must be a device in test-mode.
        Parameters:
        session - the session token
        Throws:
        InvalidSessionException - if the session is invalid
        IllegalStateException - if there is no device in test-mode

      • consultPatientMeasurements

        MeasurementList consultPatientMeasurements(String patientId,
                                         Date start,
                                         Date end,
                                         Session session)
                                           throws InvalidSessionException,
                                                  EntityNotFoundException
        Returns all measurements in the database for the given patient (by id). The measurements can be filtered with startFilter and endFilter. There will only be measurements returned which are after startFilter and before endFilter. If either (or both) of them is null, the filter is ignored.
        Parameters:
        patientId - the patient to get the measurements from
        start - the startFilter
        end - the endFilter
        session - the session token
        Returns:
        a MeasurementList containing the measurements
        Throws:
        InvalidSessionException - if the session is invalid
        EntityNotFoundException - if the patient is not found in the database

      • consultObservationPeriodMeasurements

        MeasurementList consultObservationPeriodMeasurements(Integer periodId,
                                                   Date start,
                                                   Date end,
                                                   Session session)
                                                     throws InvalidSessionException,
                                                            EntityNotFoundException
        Returns all measurements in the database for the given period (by id). The measurements can be filtered with startFilter and endFilter. There will only be measurements returned which are after startFilter and before endFilter. If either (or both) of them is null, the filter is ignored.
        Parameters:
        periodId - the period to get the measurements from
        start - the startFilter
        end - the endFilter
        session - the session token
        Returns:
        a MeasurementList containing the measurements
        Throws:
        InvalidSessionException - if the session is invalid
        EntityNotFoundException - if the patient is not found in the database

      • returnDevice

        void returnDevice(Integer deviceId,
                Session session)
                  throws InvalidSessionException,
                         EntityNotFoundException,
                         DeviceNotAssignedException
        Returns a device from an observation period. After this, the device can be reused and assigned to an other patient.
        Parameters:
        deviceId - the device to return
        session - the session token
        Throws:
        InvalidSessionException - if the session is invalid
        EntityNotFoundException - if the device is not found in the database
        DeviceNotAssignedException - if the device is not assigned to an observation period
